phrases: You like him...

But...

I will never...

Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
I love this destiny
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
Episode 22 ...
Thanks for walking me home...
Not at all.
You should warm yourself up inside, and go to bed early.
Yeah...
Takahashi!
I was just at the station, and you were not there...
I am sorry for breaking our promise.
Go home...
Head inside.
You did not think something like this would make her cry, did you?
You thought something like this was nothing, since you did not have feelings for Yamamoto.
That is why you were able to go, right?
Because there would be nothing to feel guilty about.
But it is different for Takahashi!
How do you plan to explain your actions to Takahashi, who is still not confident about all of this yet?
You and Takahashi experience things totally differently, all the way down to the bottom!
I do not intend to blame you for going to see Yamamoto.
But...
I do not think the important thing to do is always the same as the right thing to do!
Is not it important to not hurt Takahashi?
You did not think something like this would make her cry, did you?
You thought something like this was nothing.
But it is different for Takahashi!
You hurt Takahashi.
Training School
Damn it!
Morning!
You catch a cold or something?
Your face is bright red.
It took me two hours to walk home last night...
Huh?!
In that snow storm?!
I did not have enough for the bus...
Go rest somewhere... you look like you are about to collapse.
Congrats!
Umm...
Nana, so you are finally...!
Yeah!
We were so worried for you, like we were your parents.
So, how was it?
Did everything go well?
YOU-Umm...
Takahashi.
Ah... I have to get the class day book...
I am sorry!
Takahashi!
W-Wait up!
Let go of me!
Takahashi.
Ah, Takeuchi-kun.
I heard he fell?
Ah, yeah.
He went home early.
Seriously?
Did he have a fever?
He will be fine.
They said it was just a cold.
Got To go.
Takahashi.
Are you... avoiding me?
No...
He stood you up and went to see Yamamoto instead?
What is up with that?
He is scum!
Nana, you are just being selfish.
What?
He went to see another girl!
Is not that awful?
But it is not like he hid it.
He told her.
When accidents like that happen, you cannot do anything about it.
You do not fully understand the situation.
I do not know about that!
Why does Nana have to be the one to wait, and not Yamamoto?
Because she is his girlfriend, right?
Always expecting him to put you first because of that is a bit much.
If there is trust in the relationship, something like that should not bother you.
Trust, you say?
It is because he goes and does things like this that she cannot trust him!
That is not really his problem, is it?
It is hers.
My... problem?
Yano probably went because he did not think there would be a problem, right?
And he trusted you, too.
Am I wrong?
Trust...?
But... if my mom collapsed, I do not think Yano would come running to me.
You would not even call Yano, would you?
Is not that kind of sad?
I would come to you, Mizu-chin!
I think I would come, too!
Trust, huh...?
That is something I always seem to be lacking...
It is like we kept hitting on the same point every time...
Yamamoto and I had sex.
Deep in my heart, I may not have been able to forgive that.
The problem...
But please... do not make me any more uneasy...
How do you feel?
Your fever seems to have broken.
You slept for almost a day, you know.
And there is someone here to see you.
Can I let her in?
Someone is here to see me?
Ah, stay in bed.
How do you feel?
I heard you almost had pneumonia?
Not really.
I am better now.
I see.
I was worried, since you took two days off from school.
I made a copy of the class notes for you.
That is all right.
I can get them from someone else.
I sliced up the cantaloupe.
Ah... excuse me.
She brought it as get-well-soon gift, Motoharu.
Be sure to thank her.
I have loved you this whole time...
Your mom's really pretty.
You might catch my cold, so go home when you are done.
I hardly ever catch colds, so I should be fine-
Go home.
I ended up coming...
I do not really want to see him yet, but I got worried because he is been absent for two days...
I will look in on him, and then leave-
Why...?
Yamamoto-san!
I think it is a bit selfish to say this, but...
Why?
Because
Yano's the guy I am going out with.
Then why do not you tell him that?
Because you are Nana-san's little sister.
Because you are not just some stranger.
That is why Yano finds it hard to make a decision!
I do not see him as my sister's boyfriend.
What do you even know?
You have only been his girlfriend for a year.
But I have known him since before he was going out with my sister...
I know I can understand him a whole lot more than you can!
A whole lot more than you can!
I cannot do anything about that, can I?
I cannot do anything about what I do not know, can I?
Or... am I the wrong one here?
Takahashi...
Can I not understand him enough?
She says she knew him when he was having the hardest time ever...
I am trying so hard, too... so very hard...
But it is still... not enough?
Takahashi.
There is a limit to things.
You are right to try your hardest.
But... really understanding him is impossible.
The same way he cannot do what you want him to do, you cannot understand what he wants you to understand.
There is nothing you can do about the differences in the way you two think.
Then... what am I supposed to do?
Take.
Huh?
Are you alone?
I thought I heard someone else.
Were you talking to someone?
Do not bother coming to visit.
You will catch my cold, so go home.
It is cold out, so close your window.
Yeah.
Take... I do not understand anything.
You do not understand what?
How to go out with Takahashi without hurting her.
I wonder if it is just one of my defects as a human?
This is not a first for you, right?
This is a first.
I am not confident.
I must be really pathetic, huh?
I cannot forgive myself for making her cry.
But...
I am not confident that I will not be able to keep from hurting her.
But...
Takahashi!
What is the matter?
You have to get some rest.
Hey... are you sure no one else really came?
Huh?
Yeah.
Motoharu!
You cannot go outside like this!
Motoharu!
Let go!
There is no one here!
Motoharu, look out there!
You do not see anyone, do you?
Just because your fever's dropped a little does not mean you can let your guard down.
Takahashi!
Wait-!
Do not be so nice to me when I am weak!
When you are weak...?
It is not fair.
Then... smile.
Make your fun smile like usual, and be yourself.
Then I will be able to...
This is useless...
Why do you always have to cry?
I would always make you smile.
Are not you supposed to be happy with him?
I would be by your side.
Are not you happy?
Why else would you stick with this relationship?!
I would always find you before you had to go looking for me!
I would do whatever you wish for!
There is only one way to allow such a thing.
If you cannot figure it out, you do not have the right to do such a thing.
There is something I have been wanting to talk to you about, Motoharu...
What is it?
I know it is a little weird to tell you when you are like this, but...
I am thinking of getting divorced.
I can make you happier than he can, Takahashi!
I have actually been worrying over this for about a year.
But I was not able to make up my mind.
But about one month ago, one of my old friends gave me a call.
I think you remember her.
You know, that lady who used to be my hair stylist?
I cannot leave you like this anymore.
And she asked if I could come help her with her work.
Finding employment at my age was one of my big worries, so I thought this might be my chance.
And I do not want to let it pass me by.
Let us put an end to all the crying and worrying.
When two people are together, are not you supposed to have more fun than when you are alone?
Are we moving to Tokyo?
I want to protect you, Takahashi!
Every night before falling asleep, I wish for my dream to come true.
And each morning manages to be different.
And I still cannot see the future.

A silent rain falls.
A slightly chilly rain.
But it continues to fall, without actually hitting me
as if it is trying to freeze my heart instead.
I have always found your gentle back
on any day, but where do my
winding feelings point?
I wonder what you see
before you?
We keep on running
and we seem like we are going to reach, but do not.
At that distance away from you.
Rain will fall again someday.
A slightly lonely rain
will pour all around and spread
as if it is meant to soothe my heart.
I am always looking at your cute back
but these winding feelings
point me in the other direction.
What am I waiting for
at the end of my search?
We keep on running
and we seem like we are going to catch up, but do not.
At that distance away from you.
We keep on running
and we seem like we are going to catch up, but do not.
At that distance away from you.
At that distance away from you.
At that distance away from you.
At that distance away from you.
Episode 23 Preview...
I might not be the right girl for Yano after all...
I cannot understand his feelings at all.
Why cannot we do something so easy...?
I am sorry.
I take back the words I said two years ago...
That was still the worst thing you could have done.
